consider with choices.template: Consider the following story: "{input_sentence_1} {input_sentence2} {input_sentence_3} {input_sentence_4}" Choice 1: {sentence_quiz1} Choice 2: {sentence_quiz2} Which is the more plausible ending of this story, choice 1 or choice 2?

consider without choices.template: Consider the following story: "{input_sentence_1} {input_sentence2} {input_sentence_3} {input_sentence_4}" Choice 1: {sentence_quiz1} Choice 2: {sentence_quiz2} Which is the more plausible ending of this story?
